"Bielikov young developer built the Bitstarz Casino & Slots Place app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by Bielikov young developer at no cost and is intended for use as is.
This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service.
If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which are accessible at Bitstarz Casino & Slots Place unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.
Information Collection and Use
For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to Advertising id, onesignal id, device id. The information that I request will be retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way.
The app does use third-party services that may collect information used to identify you.
Link to the privacy policy of third-party service providers used by the app
\t‚Ä¢ Google Play Services \t‚Ä¢ Google Analytics for Firebase \t‚Ä¢ Firebase Crashlytics \t‚Ä¢ One Signal
Log Data
I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third-party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (‚ÄúIP‚Äù) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
Cookies
Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.
This Service does not use these ‚Äúcookies‚Äù explicitly. However, the app may use third-party code and libraries that use ‚Äúcookies‚Äù to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
Service Providers
I may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
\t‚Ä¢ To facilitate our Service; \t‚Ä¢ To provide the Service on our behalf; \t‚Ä¢ To perform Service-related services; or \t‚Ä¢ To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
I want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to their Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
Security
I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security.
Links to Other Sites
This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
Children‚Äôs Privacy
These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. I do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13 years of age. In the case I discover that a child under 13 has provided me with personal information, I immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact me so that I will be able to do the necessary actions.
Changes to This Privacy Policy
I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
This policy is effective as of 2023-09-18
Contact Us
If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at bielikov889@gmail.com.
This privacy policy page was created at privacypolicytemplate.net and modified/generated by App Privacy Policy Generator"

"Wild Spin slot is a neon-themed online game with attractive graphics. This is a classic slot game that will give you the atmosphere of Vegas. Though this beautiful slot has typical slot machine features and it‚Äôs new and has a modern touch. Wild Spin is a five-reel slot with three rows and 25 paylines. For some, 25 paylines may not be as impressive as other video slots that offer hundreds of them. However, like many other Platipus Gaming slots, Wild Spin casino game does have good rewards, which we will get to as you read further. Additionally, the game‚Äôs interface and buttons are easy to navigate. You will find the Spin button and most of the other buttons at the bottom of the screen. On the far right is the big blue rectangular spin button; you can click on it to start spinning. Otherwise, you can press the spacebar key if you‚Äôre playing on your desktop. The Autoplay button is a smaller version of the Spin button for multiple spins, as they both have the round arrow in the centre. You can click on it and get to set how many spins you‚Äôd like, the single win limit and loss limit. There is no specific strategy we can give to guarantee wins; keep rolling and cross your fingers for good luck. The Wild spin symbol is special because it substitutes all the other symbols, except the Scatter symbol. Wild symbols have to appear on reels number two, three, four and five for you to win. Contrary to this, two or more Scatter symbols can appear anywhere on the reels to score you rewards. Of course, the more scatters appear, the bigger the reward."

"Books of Giza is an Egyptian-themed online casino game that features 5 reels and 10 paylines. The game takes you on a journey through ancient Egypt where you can discover hidden treasures and uncover the secrets of the pyramids. The symbols in Books of Giza include various Egyptian-themed icons such as scarab beetles, hieroglyphics, and the eye of Ra. The most valuable symbol is the Pharaoh, which can reward you with up to 5,000 coins if you land five of them on a payline. One of the most exciting features of Books of Giza is the Book symbol, which acts as both the Wild and Scatter symbol. This means that it can substitute for any other symbol on the reels to help you create winning combinations, and it can also trigger the game\'s bonus feature. If you land three or more Book symbols anywhere on the reels, you will trigger the game\'s bonus! Overall, Books of Giza is a fun and exciting online casino game that offers the chance to win big with its expanding symbols and free spins bonus feature."

"Dive into a glorious garden full of wonderful lotus flowers that will bring you good luck and great prizes. We are bringing you Royal Lotus online slot from Platipus Games. Royal Lotus is an interesting game set in a beautiful seaside scenery with cherry trees in the background. You‚Äôll notice from the get go that this is a video slot inspired by Asia, however‚Ä¶if you‚Äôre thinking how oversaturated the slot market is with Oriental-themed releases, there‚Äôs an uncommon reel setup to make up for this. The main symbols include a ring, a mandolin and a golden comb. They are accompanied by low paying card symbols. The Wild symbol is represented by the beautiful lady icon. This symbol substitutes for all the common ones, except the scatter, jackpot and bonus symbols. The Wild symbols may appear as stacked on the second, third and fourth reels. The golden chest is the game‚Äôs Bonus symbol. Land five of these symbols anywhere on the reels and activate the Free spins round. You will be awarded 8 Free Spins. Additional free spins can be retriggered during the Free spins round."

"Blackjack is a popular card game from Platipus Games that is enjoyed by many online casino players. The objective of the game is to beat the dealer\'s hand by having a hand value closer to 21 without going over 21. To start playing Blackjack, the player is dealt two cards and the dealer is dealt one card face up and one card face down. The player must then decide whether to "hit" and be dealt another card or "stand" and keep their current hand. The dealer must also follow a set of rules for their hand, which usually involves hitting until their hand value is at least 17. In addition to hitting and standing, there are also other options such as "double down" and "split". Doubling down allows the player to double their original bet and receive one more card, while splitting allows the player to split their hand into two separate hands if their original two cards are of the same value. Blackjack is a game of both luck and skill, and there are many different strategies that players can use to increase their chances of winning. One popular strategy is to follow a basic strategy chart, which outlines the best moves to make depending on the player\'s hand value and the dealer\'s up card. Overall, Blackjack is a fun and exciting online casino game that can be enjoyed by players of all skill levels. Whether you\'re a seasoned pro or a beginner, the game offers plenty of thrills and excitement."

"With Wolf Gold, Pragmatic Play here comes with a slot that takes place out on the prairie. Here the full moon shines brightly and the wolves guard their gold. You play here on a slot that has 5 reels, 3 rows and 25 paylines. Here you get the honor of playing on a really wonderfully designed slot. Where in the background you see an environment similar to the Grand Canyon. Where wolves roam freely with other animals. At this slot you can take part in a variety of wonderful symbols. Where the lower paying symbols are J, Q, K and A. The higher paying symbols are the cunning cougar, the wild horse, the scouting eagle and the majestic buffalo. Here you can also take part in the wild symbol, which consists of the wolf itself. You can get moon symbols, which we go into more detail a little further down in this review. To be able to take advantage of the game\'s bonus, you need to collect scatter symbols"

"Following on with the Chinese theme on display in previous variants of the title, the highly volatile slot utilises the Megaways‚Ñ¢ trademark , featuring a 7√ó6 layout and a mammoth 117,649 different ways for players to win! 5 Lions Megaways‚Ñ¢ utilises a tumbling mechanic that appears after wins to remove winning symbols from the reels. The Asian-inspired title also features mind-blowing multipliers and a choice of seven different Free Game options, giving it all the components of a first-rate gaming adventure. The Wild symbol in the game is a Gold Lion, helping to create more winning combinations by substituting all other symbols except for the Scatter symbols, which appear in the form of a Yin and Yang. Yin and Yang symbols can trigger the Free Game, where players get to choose between seven different Free Game modes, controlling the number of Free Spins and multiplier values they receive. Players can also choose to purchase the Free Game feature at the cost of 100x their bet before each spin in certain jurisdictions. The Free Game can also be extended by additional rounds if the player lands three or more Scatter symbols on the reels."

"Hit the Jackpot and come back for more and more! BGaming is happy to announce the release of a brand new slot - Elvis Frog in Vegas. Our froggy drives in his pinky limo at full speed to give a breathtaking and spectacular show not only in Vegas, but through the entire world! Elvis Frog in Vegas is a slot that associates with plenty of marvelous music and rock and roll. The game has five reels, three rows and 25 paylines with free spins, respins and a special bonus round where a player can hit a Major and Mega Jackpots with a Tutti-Frutti Feature. In addition to the amazing assets of the game, the cartoonish style and positive general thrust, the enhanced sound presentation will make the game especially delightful, because enjoying Elvis‚Äôs motives is a pleasure no one would resist. Feel that festive atmosphere of winnings and jackpots now!"

"Buffalo Hold and Win is a popular online slot game that features a wildlife theme and offers the chance to win big. The game is set against a backdrop of a beautiful American prairie, with buffalos, eagles, and other wild animals appearing on the reels. The objective of the game is to land matching symbols on the paylines in order to win cash prizes. The most valuable symbol is the buffalo, which can reward you with the game\'s top prize. In addition to regular symbols, the game also features special symbols such as the Scatter and Bonus symbols. The Scatter symbol can trigger the game\'s free spins feature if you land three or more of them on the reels, while the Bonus symbol can trigger the Hold and Win bonus game if you land three or more of them. During the Hold and Win bonus game, you\'ll be taken to a new screen where you\'ll have the chance to win even more prizes. You\'ll be given three spins, and every time you land a Bonus symbol, your spins will be reset to three. The game ends when you run out of spins or when you fill all 15 positions on the reels with Bonus symbols. One of the most exciting features of Buffalo Hold and Win is the Jackpot game. This feature can be triggered during the Hold and Win bonus game by filling certain positions on the reels with Bonus symbols. If you\'re lucky enough to trigger the Jackpot game, you\'ll have the chance to win one of three different jackpots: Mini, Major, or Mega. Overall, Buffalo Hold and Win is a fun and exciting online casino game that offers plenty of chances to win big. So, if you\'re a fan of wildlife-themed slots, be sure to give this game a spin!"
